papers.title: Identity Fragmentation in Post-Secondary Computing Education
papers.author: Mara Kirdani-Ryan
papers.tagline: My PhD thesis, I explore what spaces can be made for CS students to do identity work in learning cultures that delegitimize identity (among many other things)

papers.title: “Taught to be automata”: Examining the departmental role in shaping initial career choices of computing students
papers.author: Mara Kirdani-Ryan, Amy J. Ko, and Emilia A. Borislova
papers.tagline: CS departments encourage students to pursue prestigious work over all other options

papers.tagline:
Making structures explicit to critique in context
